turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello there, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I wanted to make an order from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, how many pizzas would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I want two medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, 2 medium pizzas. what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want one with bacon and avocado.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I want the other one with sausage and olives.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it looks like they don't serve avocado on their pizzas. should i substitute it for another ingredient?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, why not make it

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: onions.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what type of crust would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want your gluten-free crust for both of those, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. so let me confirm your order. 2 medium pizzas, one with bacon and onions and the other one with sausage and olives, gluten free crust for both.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thanks for confirming that. are there any other special instructions?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, can you also get me a 2L Coke?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i'll add a 2 liter coke to your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $43.50.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your order will be ready for pickup in 34 minutes at bella luna's.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy, bye!
